thread.title: Trump to Nominate Robert Wilkie as Head of Veterans Affairs

author: Peter Nicholas
title: Trump to Nominate Robert Wilkie as Head of Veterans Affairs
text:
WASHINGTON—President Donald Trump said he plans to nominate Robert Wilkie, who is serving as acting secretary of the Department of Veterans Affairs, to lead the agency.
Speaking at a White House event Friday focused on prison reform, Mr. Trump praised Mr. Wilkie’s work at the VA as he announced the nomination. “I’ll be informing him in a little while—he doesn’t know this yet—that we’re going to be putting his name up for nomination to be the secretary of the VA,” Mr. Trump said.
...
